title: French motorways face carbonisation dilemma when toll contracts expire
description: As France approaches the end of its concession contracts, it faces a key test of how it will fund the road-network upgrades needed for decarbonisation
content: Despite representing just a small fraction of Frances road network, concessioned motorways play an outsized role in national mobility, carrying nearly half of all freight and a significant share of p… [+5005 chars]
